item.description:
This is a benefit concert for the Boston Center for Refugee Health & Human Rights.

Performances by Federator N*1 & Soulfege bring revolutionary, positive music to the party. Dance for a good cause. Tickets are $15, with all proceeds to the BCRHHR.

Federator N*1 is an 11 piece afro-dance, afro-beat band based in Boston featuring fantastic local talent. Only one year old, they've already made a name for themselves on the Boston scene - opening for Oumou Sangare, playing Johnny Ds, Church, the Paradise, and Berklee Spring Fest.

Soulfege was formed in Boston 10 years ago, and has been playing afro-centric grooves the whole time, traversing the country and the globe.

Tickets: http://ryles.interticket.com/arrivalorder.php?eid=2487

More info:
http://www.federator1.com/content/boston-center-refugee-health-and-human-rights-gala-performance
http://www.facebook.com/events/360019747366419/
item.name: Soul Refuge @ Ryles
